snippet: The man received an undisclosed amount of cash in the first and third robberies, but left empty-handed in the second.
abstract: Police are searching for a man they say held up three Brooklyn banks in 30 minutes.
lead_paragraph: The man received an undisclosed amount of cash in the first and third robberies, but left empty-handed in the second.

headline.seo: Robber in Brooklyn Hits 3 Banks in 30 Minutes
headline.main: In Brooklyn, Suspect Robs 3 Banks in 30 Minutes
headline.print_headline: In Brooklyn, Suspect Robs Three Banks In 30 Minutes
